titleStmt.title: The Bachelor's directory being a treatise of the excellence of marriage, of its necessity, and the means to live happy in it : together with an apology for the women against the calumnies of the men.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, p. 37-46 torn, with slight loss of print. Pages 30-55 from defective British Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
